title: Development Process of a Serious Game Design Framework Based on Collaborative Web Platforms

context.prior_knowledge: Basic game design, systems thinking, and science education methodologies
context.additional_context: Learners participate simultaneously in online collaboration using personal devices and offline workshops, developing actual science education game prototypes through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain the 23 components of a serious game design framework.
Learners can complete 80% or more of the science education game design process on a collaborative web platform.
Learners can submit project outcomes that resolve multidisciplinary game design problems by applying complex system modeling.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
